    • registerSong

      public boolean registerSong(String title, String genre, String album, String author, File file) throws TitleException, AuthorException, AlbumException, GenreException, UrlException, RepeatedSongNameException
      Register song
      Parameters:
      title - Titol de la canço
      genre - Genere de la canço
      album - Album de la canço
      author - Autor de la canço
      file - File de la canço
      Returns:
      True if the song is registered
      Throws:
      TitleException - Title exception if the title is empty or blank
      AuthorException - Author exception if the author is empty or blank
      AlbumException - Album exception if the album is empty or blank
      GenreException - Genre exception if the genre is empty or blank
      UrlException - Url exception if the url is empty or blank
      RepeatedSongNameException - Repeated song name exception if the song name is repeated
